title: TrailCrest Men's Camo Fleece Bathrobe Plush House Robe - with Shawl Collar
features: CORAL FLEECE: You’ll just love the plush fleece fabric of this robe; whether after a shower, in front of the fireplace or as an additional layer.
COMFORTABLE FIT: All the sizes from M-2X fit true to size and are designed to be comfortably roomy to allow for unrestricted movement.

QUALITY IN DETAILS: Featuring bold accent colors to the vibrant camo print to make the experience all more exciting. Styled with two front pockets, a belt and an inner tie for a secure fit. The shawl collar and full length style add to comfort.

SUPERB QUALITY: 100% polyester - Machine washable. We’ve used the highest quality materials and complemented it with lock stitched seams that will last through countless washes. It won’t excessively shrink or lose color when washed in the machine.
GREAT GIFT FOR THAT SPECIAL SOMEONE: Give this original gift to that special someone. Whether they use it to sleep in, lounge about, or go out camping, they’ll have you to thank for all the coziness!
description: Feel the chill! On chilly summer nights out in the wilderness or crisp spring and autumn days, these lounge robes are the perfect cover up to keep you warm. Light enough not to be a drag, yet thick enough to keep you warm, these are great for lounging at home in bed, in front of the fireplace or to take along on your next camping or hiking trip. Featuring bold accent colors to the vibrant Highland Camo print to make the experience all the more exciting. Fully equipped with two front pockets, a belt, and inner tie for a secure fit. The shawl color and full length style add to the comfort. All set for the experience! Size Chart Small: Length- 49 ¼”, Sleeve- 24 ¾”, Underarm- 26” Medium: Length- 49 ¾”, Sleeve- 25”, Underarm- 27” Large: Length- 50”, Sleeve- 25”, Underarm- 27 ½” XL: Length- 50 ¾”, Sleeve- 24 ¾”, Underarm- 29” 2X: Length- 50 ¾”, Sleeve- 26 ½”, Underarm- 32” 3X: Length- 51 ¾”, Sleeve- 26”, Underarm- 34 ¼” 4X: Length- 52”, Sleeve-27”, Underarm- 35”
